timeline.message: Updated the XRY DSP to use the helper methods
Updated recent activity parsers to use web helpers
Slightly simplified the XRY parser refactor
Simplified XRY logic with CommHelper bug fix
Updated the XRY parser implementations to do some phone and email validation using CommunicationUtils. Created an XRYUtils to contain all the shared methods
Fixed the header date on the XRYUtils file

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason we don't need to normalize to lower case any more?
timeline.author: raman-bt

replies.bodyText: Yes, the key is lower-cased in XryKey.contains() method.
replies.author: dannysmyda

timeline.bodyText:
None of these Util methods are being used outside this package, at least not at the moment.
Leave them with package access instead of public?
timeline.author: raman-bt
